name: Hans' Adventure
overview: Once upon a time, in a dark night... Hans, the cleric, was lost in a black forest. Frightened by ghostly noises, Hans went to hide in a hole...but... That hole was as well used as entrance for a dwarves abandoned mine full of monsters. Help Hans to exit before sunrise. Hans' Adventure is an enhanced version of Escape from Dwarve's Goldmine from the same developers. It was presented in the MSXdev 2010 contest. Later on it was released in 2012 as Hans' Adventure DeLuxe Edition, and in 2018 it was published a new version which included an enhanced mode for MSX2.
